overview: Aya, Sesha, Yudi, Zaki, Kayla, Rara are now friends in a classroom unlike in Bombe 1. However, their friendship is disturbed when Yudi’s and Zaki’s father pick up them both at school. These parents turned out to hold a grudge for long time. Zaki's father had been imprisoned because of Yudi’s father's testimony in court. Hostilities between these parents impact on the friendship of Yudi and Zaki.
title: Bombe’ Dua: Dumba’-Dumba’
